string.description.discord.command.removerole: Removes the specified role to the user.
string.discord.command.removerole.success.embed: The user, **${user}**, has the role ${role} removed successfully.
string.discord.command.removerole.error.unspeci: The user that you provided was invalid! Please specify a valid user/ID.
string.discord.commands.removerole.error.unspec: The role that you provided was invalid! Please specify a valid role or its ID.
string.discord.command.removerole.error.problem: An error occurred when using this command.
string.discord.command.removerole.error.ratelim: You're currently on cooldown! You have **${seconds}** left before you can use another command.
string.discord.command.removerole.error.already: That user has either already been unbanned, or hasn't been banned whatsoever!
string.discord.command.removerole.error.botmiss: I am missing the `ROLE_PERMISSION` permission. Please turn that on so I can remove that role from the person.
string.discord.command.removerole.error.usermis: You are missing the `ROLE_PERMISSION` permission. Please have the required permission so you can remove that role from the person.
